content.question: The main goal of the Marshall Plan was to

choices.label: create a strong military alliance between the United States and Western Europe
strengthen the Chinese nationalists against the Chinese communists
speed the economic recovery and democratization of Japan
defend Greece and Turkey from communist subversion
finance the economic reconstruction of Western Europe

content.answer: finance the economic reconstruction of Western Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
